item.title: The watering down of The Da Vinci Code
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: I just shake my head at how stupid this is. From the article: "Studio officials have consulted with Catholic and other Christian specialists on how they might alter the plot of the novel to avoid offending the devout. In doing so, the studio has been asked to consider such measures as making the central premise - that Jesus had a child with Mary Magdalene - more ambiguous, and removing the name of Opus Dei." Read the whole article.
